commit_message:
Added tripleo-ci-scenario0XX-standalone-standard parent

Reparenting tripleo-ci-scenario0XX-standalone jobs,
Now scenario jobs directly parent with
tripleo-ci-base-standalone-standard job, it will
completely remove multiparenting from scenario jobs.

CS parenting structure:
* tripleo-ci-scenario0XX-standalone-standard
** tripleo-ci-centos-8-scenario0XX-standalone
** tripleo-ci-centos-9-scenario0XX-standalone

Moved all files (Trigger files), vars, featureset under job:
- tripleo-ci-scenario0XX-standalone-standard

Branches, Release, nodeset handeled by:
- tripleo-ci-centos-{8,9}-scenario0XX-standalone

Change-Id: Ib57afbac86afa29a4897682b094c8f593b5ccf45
Signed-off-by: Amol Kahat <amolkahat@gmail.com>

commit_message:
Ensure each host is type string

ssh_servers takes a list of strings. This change
ensures that each item in the list is a string
instead of type Host being returned from
InventoryManager.

Resolves: rhbz#2085492
Change-Id: Ic3dc6304287361e83e91ad05aa480ff874011f1b

commit_message:
Drop lower-constraints.txt and its testing

As discussed in TC PTG[1] and TC resolution[2], we are
dropping the lower-constraints.txt file and its testing.
We will keep lower bounds in the requirements.txt file but
with a note that these are not tested lower bounds and we
try our best to keep them updated.

This patch also fixes a broken test by updating the maximum
payload size to match the current maximum in Barbican. [3]

This patch also skips an additional broken test.  It will be
fixed in a separate patch.

[1] https://etherpad.opendev.org/p/tc-zed-ptg#L326
[2] https://governance.openstack.org/tc/resolutions/20220414-drop-lower-constraints.html#proposal
[3] https://opendev.org/openstack/barbican/src/branch/stable/yoga/barbican/common/config.py#L33

Change-Id: Id192b8eef2c2518b8a89f200727bd03c47dbd07e
git_command: git fetch https://review.opendev.org/openstack/python-barbicanclient refs/changes/34/840034/2 && git format-patch -1 --stdout FETCH_HEAD

subject: Increase swap size to 4GB
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2022-05-13 16:22:12.000000000', 'files': ['.zuul.yaml'], 'web_link': 'https://opendev.org/openstack/cinder/commit/d41abbf538b439ce8ba18ac5720dacc4cf2ac3f7', 'message': "Increase swap size to 4GB

This is to address issues in the cinder-plugin-ceph-tempest* jobs
where a significant number of builds are failing.  Symptoms are a
lot of server fault errors, identity error: unexpected status
code 500, and db connection errors in the tempest log.  On these
jobs, syslog shows multiple
   oom_reaper: reaped process xxxxxxx (mysqld)
lines.  Occasionally ceph-osd or ceph-mons are also reaped, but
it's pretty consistently mysqld.

Default swap size is currently 1G.  Increase to 4GB was determined
experimentally.  (See other patches on topic: increase-swap.)

Change-Id: I3c08f363f5b74e1fe7900f4398bd2cb6df3a80d7
"}]
commit_message:
Increase swap size to 4GB

This is to address issues in the cinder-plugin-ceph-tempest* jobs
where a significant number of builds are failing.  Symptoms are a
lot of server fault errors, identity error: unexpected status
code 500, and db connection errors in the tempest log.  On these
jobs, syslog shows multiple
   oom_reaper: reaped process xxxxxxx (mysqld)
lines.  Occasionally ceph-osd or ceph-mons are also reaped, but
it's pretty consistently mysqld.

Default swap size is currently 1G.  Increase to 4GB was determined
experimentally.  (See other patches on topic: increase-swap.)

Change-Id: I3c08f363f5b74e1fe7900f4398bd2cb6df3a80d7

commit_message:
Add the dbus-tools package to manila-share image

If configuring manila-share with the Ceph-via-NFS
driver, the service communicates with the NFS-Ganesha
gateway via DBUS [1].

[1] https://docs.openstack.org/manila/latest/contributor/ganesha.html#deployment-considerations

Change-Id: I310a3c766ec81caa04748ea6f62523e8c9678d55
Signed-off-by: Goutham Pacha Ravi <gouthampravi@gmail.com>

commit_message:
Limit pyroute2 to be <=0.6.5

[1] limited pyroute to be lower or equal than 0.6.6 to avoid new
exception NetlinkDumpInterrupted, but it badly read which pyroute
releases contain this new feature with the above exception.
So go down one more verison of pyroute to 0.6.5 and below.

[1]: https://review.opendev.org/c/openstack/requirements/+/833025
Related-Bug: #1962608

Change-Id: I35e6215ccb407da6a8d23f8e7bd2f8a0e779fe2c

commit_message:
Update devstack-heat

This useful tool was outdated and written really clumsily. This commit
rewrites bash code to Python, adds options like peeking stack.sh logs,
deploying from a commit or branch and fixes deploying from a gerrit
change.

Change-Id: Icaa01d660b2cdf376d6f000230114986a454c4fb

commit_message:
[Native CephFS] Don't fail to deny missing rules

In rare scenarios, an access rule known to manila may
be missing from CephFS. The driver shouldn't raise an
exception when this happens.

Change-Id: Iaeb84f1d9f4c04c23f470ad777d7d6cf2455f543
Closes-Bug: #1971530
Signed-off-by: Goutham Pacha Ravi <gouthampravi@gmail.com>
(cherry picked from commit 74e1fe4761b3bc4efb9a60d1b2887766c9ce43a9)
(cherry picked from commit a607ed8e999209f8a369f05191a0490ca426f4d6)
(cherry picked from commit 8805f4f3da2d474b5620f1e9d94eb984e3897db0)

added_lines: --- fixes: - | The CephFS driver no longer fails to delete access rules that were never applied or were missing from the back end storage. See `LP #1971530 <https://launchpad.net/bugs/1971530>`_ for more details.

commit_message:
Revert "The Python 3.6 and Python 3.7Support has been dropped since yaga"

This reverts commit c4d2851a13910cc36c46034ba87e6775f8c2b20b.

Reason for revert: 3.6 is not broken yet, except that this change
breaks it. Let us revert until we fully switch to Stream 9.

Change-Id: Ia2870135a90128f744afb9c45524ab003878843f
git_command: git fetch https://review.opendev.org/openstack/ironic-python-agent refs/changes/79/841879/1 && git format-patch -1 --stdout FETCH_HEAD
added_lines: python_requires = >=3.6 Programming Language :: Python :: 3.6 Programming Language :: Python :: 3.7
